data.eml:eml: New taxa of Rhododendron tschonoskii alliance (Ericaceae) from East Asia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yoichi, Watanabe, Minamitani, Tadashi, Oh, Sang-Hun, Nagano, Atsushi J., Abe, Harue, Yukawa, Tomohisa (2019): New taxa of Rhododendron tschonoskii alliance (Ericaceae) from East Asia. PhytoKeys 134: 97-114, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.134.38216, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.134.38216
